title: That Council approve the recommendation outlined in Report IPSRE22-007 dated July 4, 2022 of the Commissioner of Infrastructure and Planning Services as follows: That staff be authorized and directed to proceed as outlined in Report IPSRE22- 007 dated July 4, 2022 of the Commissioner of Infrastructure and Planning Services.
22-045 - Being a By-law to confirm the proceedings of the Council at its special meeting held on July 4, 2022.
That this meeting adjourn at 9:04 p.m.
